Text:
Thanks for sharing so much! Any chance you could share Dover's Books on Lettering, Calligraphy and Typography? There's quite a few of them. 

Any books/collections in general that you can find on lettering, typography, borders, etc. would be much appreciated.
Would you happen to have the Oxford History of the United States Series (that has Battle Cry of Freedom, The Glorious Cause, etc.) ?
